modDescription:
This makes aiming down sights completely accurate for all [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) except shotguns.

You may want to pair this modlet with my [No Crosshair on ADS](https://7daystodiemods.com/no-crosshair-on-ads/) modlet.

## Installation in 3 Steps

1. Create a Mods folder in your 7 Days to Die directory. By default in Steam itâ€™s located here: **C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\7 Days To Die**
2. Download my modlet and move the entire folder accurate-ads into the Mods folder.
3. Launch the game.
